tha-ap491:7.3: Ānando nāma nāmena → ānando nāmupaṭṭhāko (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed)
tha-ap491:16.1: Akariṃ ānantariyaṃ → akariṃnantariyañca (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr) | akarimanantariyañca (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap491:24.4: nirupamaṃ viggahaṃ → nirūpamaviggahaṃ (bj) | nirūpamaggahaṃ (si) | nirūpamaṃ viggahaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap491:30.1: dhammaruciyo thero → dhammarucitthero (bj) | dhammaruci thero (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
